description: Pre-made meatballs make this one of the easiest go-to dinners for busy weeknights.
name: Meatball & Vegetable Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced. Add the chopped vegetables to a large roasting tin, drizzle with a tablespoon of oil and roast for 20 minutes.
In a large frying pan on a high heat, drizzle the remaining oil and fry the meatballs for 5-6 minutes, until sealed and beginning to brown.
Add the garlic powder and oregano and pour over the passata and simmer for 5 minutes until reduced slightly. Add the roasted vegetables and mix well.
Add the meatballs and vegetables to an oven proof casserole dish, top with grated mozzarella, season with black pepper and bake for 25 minutes until golden and bubbling.
